message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement at a price of $11500. This is a special offer tailored just for you, considering the value this product holds for both of us.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value your product provides. I would like to counteroffer at $11000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am willing to consider $11200 as a counteroffer, which still reflects the value of the product while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to counteroffer at $11100.
Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. I am pleased to counter your offer at $11150. This price still maintains the value of the product while being competitive for both parties involved.
